template.name: Survivor
template.parameter: double P_G, double P_P, double N_p, double N_m, double C_p, double C_m, double lambda_NG, double lambda_CG, double lambda_NP,double lambda_CP

location.name: H_G
location.label: Survivor has adopted a shared identity

location.name: H_P
location.label: Survivor has NOT adopted a shared identity

location.name: R_N_G
location.label: Robot instructs survivor to help the victim directly

location.name: R_C_P
location.label: Robot instructs survivor to contact a first-responder (e.g., a firefighter)

location.name: H_Np_G
location.label: lambda_NG
_p locations: Survivor follows the robot's instruction

location.name: H_Cm_P
location.label: _m locations: Survivor ignores the robot's instruction

plot.title: Probability Density Distribution
plot.comment: Parameters: α=0.05, ε=0.05, bucket width=0.60533, bucket count=9 Runs: 72 in total, 72 (100%) displayed, 0 (0%) remaining Span of displayed sample: [0.01607, 5.464] Mean estimate of displayed sample: 0.8983 ± 0.2189 (95% CI)

query.formula: Pr[<=TAU](<> s.R_N_G or s.R_N_P) under End
Pr[<=TAU](<> s.R_C_G or s.R_C_P) under End
